propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Increases the damage you deal

altTextOverrides.overrideAltText: Adds physical damage to your melee attacks
Increases the damage you deal with spells
Adds fire damage to your melee attacks
Adds cold damage to your melee attacks
Adds lightning damage to your melee attacks
Adds void damage to your melee attacks
Adds necrotic damage to your melee attacks
Adds physical damage to your spells
Adds fire damage to your spells
Adds cold damage to your spells
Adds lightning damage to your spells
Adds void damage to your spells
Adds necrotic damage to your spells
Increases the physical damage you deal
Increases the fire, cold and lightning damage you deal
Increases the fire damage you deal
Increases the cold damage you deal
Increases the lightning damage you deal
Increases the void damage you deal
Increases the necrotic damage you deal
Increases the poison damage you deal
Increases the damage you deal with melee attacks
Increases the physical damage you deal with melee attacks
Increases the damage over time you deal
Increases the damage your minions deal
Increases the physical damage your minions deal
Increases the damage you deal with spells if you have used a potion in the past 4 seconds
Increases the damage you deal while using a channelled skill
Increases all damage dealt on hit. Does not affect damage over time.
Increases the damage of curses, but not of other ailments they apply.
Multiplicative with other modifiers
Adds damage to all spells. The type of damage added matches the base damage of the spell.
Adds damage to all melee attacks. The type of damage added matches the base damage of the attack.
Adds damage to all bow attacks. The type of damage added matches the base damage of the attack.
Adds damage to all throwing attacks. The type of damage added matches the base damage of the attack.
Adds damage to all spells. The type of damage added matches the base damage of the spell.
Adds damage to all curse spells. The type of damage added matches the base damage of the curse.
Increases the damage of ailments such as ignite, poison, bleed, and frostbite. Does not affect triggered effects such as shadow daggers or spark charges.
Poison deals poison damage over time and lasts 3 seconds. The first 30 stacks each reduce poison resistance by 5% (2% against bosses and players).
Ignite deals fire damage over time, lasts 2.5 seconds, and can stack an unlimited number of times.

Each stack of Chill reduces attack speed, cast speed and movement speed by 12% (6% against players) and is multiplicative with other modifiers, including other stacks of chill. Chill stacks up to 3 times and lasts 4 seconds by default.

Each stack of Slow reduces movement speed by 20% (10% against players) and is multiplicative with other modifiers, including other stacks of slow. Slow stacks up to 3 times and lasts 4 seconds by default.
Blinded enemies cannot critically strike.
Bleed deals physical damage over time, lasts 3 seconds, and can stack an unlimited number of times.
Shock reduces lightning resistance by 5%, increases chance to be stunned by 20%, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack up to 10 times. It has 60% reduced effect against bosses and players.
Frostbite deals cold damage over time and lasts 3 seconds. The first 15 stacks each increase chance to be frozen by 20%.
Plague deals poison damage over time and spreads between enemies. It cannot stack.
Time Rot is an ailment that deals 60 void damage over time, increases stun duration by 5%, lasts 3 seconds, and stacks up to 12 times.
Future Strike lasts 2 seconds then deals 60 void damage all at once at the end of its duration. Counts as damage over time.
Spark Charges are spells that explode after 0.7 seconds dealing lightning damage in an area around the target. This damage does not scale with modifiers to the hit that applied the charge.
Damned deals necrotic damage over time, reduces health regen by 20%, lasts 2.5 seconds, and can stack an unlimited number of times.
Frailty reduces damage dealt by 6% (multiplicative with other modifiers), lasts 4 seconds, and stacks up to 3 times.
Each stack of Armor Shred reduces armor by 100, increasing damage taken from all hits. Can reduce armor below 0. Lasts 4 seconds.
Spirit Plague is a curse that deals necrotic spell damage over time for 3 seconds and spreads to other enemies when the original target dies. It cannot stack.
Doom deals massive void damage over time, increases melee damage taken by 4%, and lasts 4 seconds. Can stack up to 4 times.
Void Resistance Shred reduces void resistance by 5% (2% against bosses and players). Lasts 4 seconds and can stack up to 10 times.
Fire Resistance Shred reduces fire resistance by 5% (2% against bosses and players). Lasts 4 seconds and can stack up to 10 times.
Cold Resistance Shred reduces cold resistance by 5% (2% against bosses and players). Lasts 4 seconds and can stack up to 10 times.
Poison Resistance Shred reduces poison resistance by 5% (2% against bosses and players). Lasts 4 seconds and can stack up to 10 times.
Necrotic Resistance Shred reduces necrotic resistance by 5% (2% against bosses and players). Lasts 4 seconds and can stack up to 10 times.
Physical Resistance Shred reduces physical resistance by 5% (2% against bosses and players). Lasts 4 seconds and can stack up to 10 times.
Lightning Resistance Shred reduces lightning resistance by 5% (2% against bosses and players). Lasts 4 seconds and can stack up to 10 times.
Haste is a buff that grants 30% Increased movement speed. It cannot stack.
Frenzy is a buff that grants 20% Increased attack and cast speed. It cannot stack.
Mark for Death is a curse that lasts for 8 seconds and reduces all resistances by 25%. It cannot stack.
Spreading Flames deals 50 fire damage per second for 4 seconds and spreads between enemies. It cannot stack.
Electrify deals lightning damage over time, lasts 2.5 seconds, and can stack an unlimited number of times.
Fear causes enemies to flee from you and your allies and lasts for 0.5 to 0.9 seconds. Enemies can only be affected by Fear once.
Efficacious Toxin causes enemies to take 12% increased damage over time for 4 seconds. It cannot stack.
Upon reaching 4 stacks of Shadow Daggers, the Daggers plunge into the target, dealing physical damage. This damage scales with modifiers to melee and throwing damage and always critically strikes.
Each stack of Critical Vulnerability adds an additional 2% chance to be crit, reduces critical strike avoidance by 10%, and lasts 4 seconds. Stacks up to 10 times.
Brand of Trespass is an ailment which deals 400 fire damage over 3 seconds, but does not stack
Brand of Deception is an ailment which deals 400 lightning damage over 3 seconds, but does not stack
Brand of Subjugation is an ailment which deals 400 cold damage over 3 seconds, but does not stack
Each stack of Withering increases damage taken from curses by 10% (6% against players and bosses), lasts 3 seconds, and can stack up to 10 times.

Torment is a Curse which deals 120 spell necrotic damage over 3 seconds with added damage applying at 200% effectiveness per second and reduces movement by 18% (multiplicative with other modifiers), but it does not stack.

Penance is a Curse that lasts 15 seconds which causes affected targets to take 20 spell fire damage when they hit another target, but it does not stack. Cannot trigger on the affected target more than once every 0.35 seconds.

Decrepify is a Curse which deals 200 physical damage over 10 seconds with added damage applying at 100% effectiveness per second, and gains 1% more damage per 5 of your missing health. It also causes the target to take 15% more damage from damage over time.
Anguish is a Curse that lasts 10 seconds, causes the target to deal 15% less damage over time, and deals necrotic damage to all enemies afflicted with it whenever you kill an enemy. It cannot stack.
Acid Skin is a Curse which deals 80 poison damage over 5 seconds with added damage applying at 80% effectiveness per second, and adds a 20% chance to be critically hit.
Witchfire is an ailment that deals 600 fire and 600 necrotic damage over 12 seconds. It cannot stack.
Chained enemies are immobilized and take 40 necrotic damage over 2 seconds with added damage applying at 200% effectiveness. This cannot stack on the same enemy.
You dodge the next hit you would receive and consume all stacks of Silver Shroud to gain 100 ward per stack.
Crimson Shroud grants +50% bleed chance and 5% less damage over time taken for 4 seconds. This stacks up to 3 times.
Dusk Shroud grants +5% glancing blow chance and 50 dodge rating for 2 seconds. This effect can stack an unlimited number of times.
Void Essence is a buff that grants 3% more void and melee damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and 15% reduced stun duration on you, stacking up to 3 times. Each stack lasts 8 seconds.

propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Increases the number of attacks you can use per second

altTextOverrides.overrideAltText: Increases the number of melee attacks you can use per second
Increases the number of melee attacks your minions can use per second

propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Increases the number of spells you can cast per second

altTextOverrides.overrideAltText: Increases the number of spells your minions can cast per second

propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Increases your chance to deal a critical strike. Your base crit chance is 5% so 100% increased crit chance would give you 10% crit chance if there are no other modifiers.

altTextOverrides.overrideAltText: Adds to your base crit chance
Adds to your base crit chance with melee attacks
Increases your chance to deal a critical strike with melee attacks. Your base crit chance is 5% so 100% increased crit chance would give you 10% crit chance if there are no other modifiers.

propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Increases the damage dealt by your critical strikes

altTextOverrides.overrideAltText: Increases the damage dealt by your melee critical strikes

propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Modifies the damage you take

altTextOverrides.overrideAltText: Reduces the damage you take when you block a hit
Reduces the damage you take from damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers)
Reduces the damage you take from enemy critical strikes. Multiplicative with other modifiers.
Reduces the damage you take when you block a hit. Multiplicative with other modifiers.
Reduces the physical damage you take when you block a hit. Multiplicative with other modifiers.
Reduces the fire, cold, and lightning damage you take when you block a hit. Multiplicative with other modifiers.
Reduces the poison damage you take while transformed. Multiplicative with other modifiers.
Reduces the fire damage you take. Multiplicative with other modifiers.

propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Increases your maximum health

altTextOverrides.overrideAltText: Adds to the maximum health of your minions
Increases the maximum health of your minions

propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Increases your maximum mana
Increases how quickly you can run

altTextOverrides.overrideAltText: Increases the movement speed of your minions
Increases your movement speed if you have used a potion in the past 4 seconds

propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Armor reduces the damage you take from all hits, but not damage over time. More effective against physical damage.

altTextOverrides.overrideAltText: Increases the armor of your minions
Increases your armor from all sources

propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Improves your chance to dodge

altTextOverrides.overrideAltText: Improves the chance for your minions to dodge

propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: All hits can have a chance to stun you based on their damage. Stun Avoidance reduces that chance.

altTextOverrides.overrideAltText: Increases your stun avoidance when you use your potion by pressing E. Stun avoidance reduces your chance to be stunned.

propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Reduces all fire damage you take. Capped at 75%.
Reduces all cold damage you take. Capped at 75%.
Reduces all lightning damage you take. Capped at 75%.
Ward is decaying shield with no limit, that steadily decays. Ward retention reduces the rate at which your ward decays.
Increases the rate at which your health regenerates over time

altTextOverrides.overrideAltText: Increases the rate at which your minions regenerate health
Increases your health regen if you have used a potion in the past 4 seconds

propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Increases the rate at which your mana regenerates over time
Each point of strength increases armor by 4% and improves skills that rely the raw strength of you and your companions
Each point of vitality grants 6 health and 1% poison and necrotic resistance.
Each point of intelligence grants 4% ward retention and improves skills that rely on carefully studied magic
Each point of dexterity adds 4 dodge rating and improves skills that rely on the skillful handling of weapons
Each point of attunement grants 2 mana and improves skills that rely on the innate magic inside you and your surroundings

propertyInfoList.textKey: Property_Master_Damage Dealt to Mana Before Health_AltText
propertyInfoList.propertyName: Damage Dealt to Mana Before Health
propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: A percentage of the damage you take is dealt to your mana instead of your health. Each point of mana shields 5 health.
Modifies the mana cost per second of channelled skills
Reduces all void damage you take. Capped at 75%.
Reduces all necrotic damage you take. Capped at 75%.
Reduces all poison damage you take. Capped at 75%.
Adds to your chance to block. Blocked hits deal less damage depending on your block effectiveness.
Adds to your physical, fire, cold, lightning, necrotic, void, and poison resistances.
Instantly regain health

altTextOverrides.overrideAltText: Instantly regain health on melee hit

propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Instantly gain ward. Ward is a temporary shield that decays over time based on the amount you currently have.
Instantly regain mana
Adds damage to all spells. The type of damage added matches the base damage of the spell.
Increases the duration of ailments you inflict

altTextOverrides.overrideAltText: Increases the duration of ignites you inflict
Increases the duration of bleeds you inflict
Increases the duration of chill you inflict
Increases the duration of shocks you inflict
Increases the duration of slows you inflict
Increases the duration of poison you inflict
Increases the duration of blinds you inflict
Increases the duration of doom you inflict

propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Increases the effect of ailments you inflict

altTextOverrides.overrideAltText: Increases the damage of ignites you inflict (multiplicative with other modifiers)
Increases the damage of bleeds you inflict (multiplicative with other modifiers)
Increases the effect of chill you inflict
Increases the effect of shocks you inflict
Increases the effect of slows you inflict
Increases the effect of poison you inflict
Increases the effect of blinds you inflict
Increases the movement speed bonus from Haste. 100% increased effect of haste would result in the bonus doubling from 30% to 60%.
Increases the damage of Plague (multiplicative with other modifiers)
Increases the damage of doom and the size of its increase to melee damage taken

propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Increases the health restored by healing skills
All your hits have a chance to stun if they deal enough damage. Increased stun chance increases that chance.
Adds to your Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence, Attunement, and Vitality.
Increases your chance to find potions. Potions are displayed next to your health globe, and can be consumed to gain health (by using the 1 key by default).
Potions are displayed next to your health globe, and can be consumed to gain health (by using the 1 key by default).
Adds to your maximum number of potions. Potions are displayed next to your health globe, and can be consumed to gain health (by using the 1 key by default).
A percentage of your damage is returned to you as health over three seconds.

altTextOverrides.overrideAltText: A percentage of the damage dealt by your melee attacks is returned to you as health over three seconds.
A percentage of the damage dealt by your hits is returned to you as health over three seconds. This does not apply to damage over time.
Increases the amount of damage you leech as health

propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Adds to your fire, cold, and lightning resistances.
Block Effectiveness reduces damage taken for hits you block.
By default when you are stunned you become immune to stuns for one second after the stun ends. This increases the duration of that immunity.
Prevents you from being stunned
Protects against void, poison, and necrotic damage. 10 dark protection is like 10 effective health against void, poison, or necrotic damage.
Penetration can reduce effective resistance below 0%, increasing damage even against enemies with no resistance. It applies to all damage, including damage over time.

altTextOverrides.overrideAltText: Physical Penetration can reduce effective Physical Resistance below 0%, increasing damage even against enemies with no resistance.
Lightning Penetration can reduce effective Lightning Resistance below 0%, increasing damage even against enemies with no resistance.
Cold Penetration can reduce effective Cold Resistance below 0%, increasing damage even against enemies with no resistance.
Fire Penetration can reduce effective Fire Resistance below 0%, increasing damage even against enemies with no resistance.
Void Penetration can reduce effective Void Resistance below 0%, increasing damage even against enemies with no resistance.
Necrotic Penetration can reduce effective Necrotic Resistance below 0%, increasing damage even against enemies with no resistance.
Poison Penetration can reduce effective Poison Resistance below 0%, increasing damage even against enemies with no resistance.
Penetration can reduce effective resistance below 0%, increasing damage even against enemies with no resistance.

propertyInfoList.textKey: Property_Master_Chance to receive a Glancing Blow when hit_AltText
propertyInfoList.propertyName: Chance to receive a Glancing Blow when hit
propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Grants a chance to recieve a glancing blow when hit. Glancing blows deal 35% less damage.
Modifies the cost of skills you use

altTextOverrides.overrideAltText: Modifies the cost of spells you use

propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Cold skills have a chance to freeze on hit equal to their freeze rate divided by the target's health.

Increases the efficiency of your mana usage
Mana cost = base mana cost / (1 + mana efficiency)
Increases the speed at which your skills come off cooldown
Reduces all physical damage you take. Capped at 75%.
Drains a percent of your current health per second. You can't die from this effect
Enemies are killed at this percentage of their health
Damage converted to lightning before mitigation
Damage converted to physical before mitigation
Damage converted to fire before mitigation
Damage converted to cold before mitigation
Damage converted to void before mitigation
Damage converted to poison before mitigation
Damage converted to necrotic before mitigation
Increases the maximum number of companions a Primalist can have active at once

propertyInfoList.textKey: Property_Master_Chance to gain Haste for 1 second on Hit_AltText
propertyInfoList.propertyName: Chance to gain Haste for 1 second on Hit
propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Haste is a buff that grants 30% increased movement speed. Haste does not stack.

Gives you a chance to chill enemies when they hit you. Chill reduces attack speed, cast speed, and movement speed by 12% (multiplicative with other modifiers) and lasts 4 seconds. It can stack up to 3 times and is 50% less effective against Players.

Gives you a chance to slow enemies when they hit you. Each stack of Slow reduces movement speed by 20% (multiplicative with other modifiers) and lasts 4 seconds. It can stacks up to 3 times and is 50% less effective against Players.
Damage is dealt directly to attackers when you take a hit. Not affected by enemy defenses.
A percentage of the damage you take is dealt directly to the attacker. Mitigation applies before reflection. Reflecting damage does not affect how much damage you take.

Gives you a chance to shock enemies when they hit you. Shock reduces lightning resistance by 5%, increases chance to be stunned by 20%, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack up to 10 times. It has 60% reduced effect against bosses and players.
Gives a chance to downgrade an enemy's crit on you to a regular hit. Unmodified enemies have a 5% crit chance.
A percentage of the health you would gain from using a potion is gained as ward instead. There is no effect above 100%.
Ward is a decaying shield that protects your health
When you kill an enemy with a hit a percentage of the excess damage is returned to you as health over three seconds.
Causes you to generate ward over time. Ward naturally decays over time so your total ward will stabilize at a point where the regen is equal to the decay.

propertyInfoList.textKey: Property_Master_Damage Dealt to Mana Before Health or Ward_AltText
propertyInfoList.propertyName: Damage Dealt to Mana Before Health or Ward
propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: A percentage of the damage you take is dealt to your mana instead of your health or ward. Each point of mana shields 5 health.
Increases the duration of stuns you inflict
Reduces the duration of stuns on you

propertyInfoList.textKey: Property_Master_Chance to Gain 30 Ward when Hit_AltText
propertyInfoList.propertyName: Chance to Gain 30 Ward when Hit
propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Ward is a decaying overshield that protect your health. Extra chance above 100% has no effect. Applies after damage taken, unless the damage would be lethal.
Ward is a decaying overshield that protect your health. Only affects mana spent, not mana drained.
Increases the speed at which health is gained from Health Leech. Does not change the total amount leeched.

propertyInfoList.textKey: Property_Master_Freeze Rate per stack of Chill_AltText
propertyInfoList.propertyName: Freeze Rate per stack of Chill
propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Increases your chance to freeze for each stack of chill on the target. Multiplicative with other modifiers.
Adds to your physical and void resistances.
Adds to your necrotic and poison resistances.

propertyInfoList.textKey: Property_Master_Chance to Receive a Critical Strike_AltText
propertyInfoList.propertyName: Chance to Receive a Critical Strike
propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Adds to your chance to receive a critical strike when hit. Not affected by the attacker's increased critical strike chance.
Reduces damage dealt to your health below your Endurance Threshold. Capped at 60%.
Damage dealt to your health below your Endurance Threshold is reduced by your Endurance

altTextOverrides.overrideAltText: Multiplicative with other modifiers

propertyInfoList.textKey: Property_Master_Maximum Health gained as Endurance Threshold_AltText
propertyInfoList.propertyName: Maximum Health gained as Endurance Threshold
propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Gain a portion of your maximum health as endurance threshold. Damage taken your health below your endurance threshold is reduced by your endurance.

propertyInfoList.textKey: Property_Master_reduced Bonus Damage Taken from Critical Strikes_AltText
propertyInfoList.propertyName: reduced Bonus Damage Taken from Critical Strikes
propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Reduces the bonus damage taken from crits. Cannot reduce damage below that of a regular hit. This stat is multiplicative with other damage modifiers, but multiple sources of this stat are additive.
Counts stacks on the Target. Multiplicative with other modifiers.
Increases the area of effect of skills with the Area tag. Additive with other sources of increased area.

altTextOverrides.overrideAltText: Increases the area of effect of skills with the Area tag and the Spell tag. Additive with other sources of increased area.

propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: Multiplicative with other modifiers

altTextOverrides.overrideAltText: Multiplicative with other modifiers. Enemies below 35% of max health count as on Low Health.
Multiplicative with other modifiers. Enemies above 65% of max health count as on High Health.
Multiplicative with other modifiers. Branded enemies are enemies afflicted by Brand of Deception, Brand of Trespass, or Brand of Subjugation.
Multiplicative with other modifiers. Branded enemies are enemies afflicted by Brand of Deception, Brand of Trespass, or Brand of Subjugation.
Multiplicative with other modifiers. Only affects enemies moving of their own volition, not being pulled or pushed.

Multiplicative with other modifiers. Only affects enemies moving of their own volition, not being pulled or pushed. Affects the damage of physical ailments such as bleed, but does not affect triggered effects such as shadow daggers.
Multiplicative with other modifiers. Does not include rare enemies.
Multiplicative with other modifiers. Does not include rare enemies. Affects the damage of physical ailments such as bleed, but does not affect triggered effects such as shadow daggers.
Multiplicative with other modifiers. Each ailment is only counted once, additional stacks of the same ailment do not count towards this effect.

propertyInfoList.textKey: Property_Master_Armor Mitigation also applies to Damage over Time_AltText
propertyInfoList.propertyName: Armor Mitigation also applies to Damage over Time
propertyInfoList.defaultAltText: For example, if you have enough armor to reduce hit damage by 60% and 50% of your Armor Mitigation also applies to Damage over Time then armor will reduce damage over time by 30%.

Ward does not decay below your Ward Decay Threshold and ward below the threshold does not contribute to decay rate. For example if you have a Ward Decay Threshold of 500 then ward will not decay below 500 and ward decay rate at 1000 ward will be halved.

Parrying a hit reduces the hit damage taken to zero. It does not prevent other effects of the hit. Parry Chance has no effect on damage over time and is capped at 75%. Parried hits cannot also be blocked and cannot be glancing blows.

Increases your chance to see certain prophecies in the osbervatory.

Lenses that block activities or increase the cost of prophecies do not stack.

conditionalDamagePropertyDescriptions.description: to enemies with less remaining health than your current ward
to Enemies afflicted by Brand of Deception
to Branded Bosses and Rare Enemies
per stack of Armor Shred (up to 14)
per Negative Ailment on the Target
per Negative Ailment on the Target (up to 8)
to Enemies Marked by a Falcon
to Enemies affllicted by Spreading Flames
